EmailTemplate.name: 201907_Americas_DU875-ADSB Bundle_KR.201908_Americas_Flightstar_DU/ADS-B Bundle_
EmailTemplate.subject: It’s Not Too Late! Save on ADS-B When You Upgrade to Primus Elite
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
There has never been a better time than now to improve the safety and situational awareness of your Learjet 45 – but the clock is ticking!
For a limited time, when you upgrade two or more of your obsolete DU-870 displays to DU-875 on your Learjet 40/45, Flightstar will waive STC cost for your ADS-B out upgrade (a $7k value). This is on top of Honeywell incentives that include a $35,000 trade-in credit per DU-870 display unit and additional savings on your Honeywell Maintenance Service Plan – Avionics (formally known as HAPP).
This offer expires when capacity is filled so don’t delay. Contact Flightstar today to discuss your needs and request a quote.
I WANT TO UPGRADE MY LEAR 45! <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/upgrade-your-cockpit-with-honeywell-du-875-screens-and-save-on-ads-b-out?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_flightstar_du875_adsb&utm_term=m:1]]>
